discussion.p: P0558R1 missed updating one of the std::atomic_exchange signatures to avoid independent deduction for T on the second parameter.
discussion.note: 2017-07-26 Moved to Tentatively Ready after 6 positive votes on c++std-lib.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4659.

blockquote.pre: template<class T> T atomic_exchange(volatile atomic<T>*, typename atomic<T>::value_type) noexcept;
